channel.title: SalvationX667
channel.description: [size=36pt][size=14pt][font=arial black][img]http://imgur.com/DVgchIK.png[/img] Website: http://salvationx667.enjin.com Download client: https://www.dropbox.com/s/n14ttarhrz2bvwa/SalvationX667.jar Forum: http://salvationx667.enjin.com/forum Welcome to Salvation, the RuneScape private server brought to you by kush and Alpaca. We have over 30 registered members, playable 24/7.Here at SalvationX we take a different approach the other generic servers you come across. We work endlessly to bring you dedicated, high performance environment to play our enjoyable, content-filled server emulator.We invest alot of dollars into our secure and stable server architecture to ensure dedicated uptime and a fast connection, all protected behind high quality firewall mechanisms. Security and stability are very important to us, that's why we make sure we are the best around at offering this.In regard to content, Salvationx is a spawn server,We also have some of the most enjoyable Pking around, our Wilderness zones are always packed with pkers. Features: Tons of customs Custom ranks Custom bosses Damage tent Awsome donor benifets Kinda spawn but not fully Online 24/7 VPS hosted Active staff Awsome owners Daily updates and events images customs we got more come to see em [img]http://imgur.com/pJGCqdR.png[/img] [img]http://imgur.com/WJFDpcw.png[/img] [img]http://imgur.com/J7fdNIm.png[/img] custom bosses [img]http://imgur.com/GyNJLnf.png[/img] [img]http://imgur.com/adfA8Ve.png[/img] [img]http://imgur.com/EQFdhvV.png[/img] announcments when opening pvp caskets and drops! [img]http://imgur.com/MGQlKFW.png[/img] custom ranks [img]http://imgur.com/ciO465Z.png[/img] pce! [img]http://i.imgur.com/NzDwxBr.png[/img][/font][/size][/size]
